.. module:: wx.lib.plot.polyobjects

.. currentmodule:: wx.lib.plot.polyobjects

.. highlight:: python



.. _wx.lib.plot.polyobjects:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.plot.polyobjects**
==========================================================================================================================================

polyobjects.py
==============

This contains all of the PolyXXX objects used by :mod:`wx.lib.plot`.


|class_summary| Classes Summary
===============================

================================================================================ ================================================================================
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PlotGraphics`                                     Creates a PlotGraphics object.
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PlotPrintout`                                     Controls how the plot is made in printing and previewing
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolyBars`                                         Creates a PolyBars object.
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolyBarsBase`                                     Base class for PolyBars and PolyHistogram.
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolyBoxPlot`                                      Creates a PolyBoxPlot object.
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolyHistogram`                                    Creates a PolyHistogram object.
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolyLine`                                         Creates PolyLine object
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolyMarker`                                       Creates a PolyMarker object.
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolyPoints`                                       Base Class for lines and markers.
:ref:`~wx.lib.plot.polyobjects.PolySpline`                                       Creates PolySpline object
================================================================================ ================================================================================


|
